cancelPolicy(uint256).details: Cancel policy and refund premium if eligible

createPolicy(address,uint256,uint256,uin.details: Create a new policy with ZK proof validation

params.zkProofHash: Hash of the ZK proof for validation

initialize(address,address,address).details: Initialize function (replaces constructor for upgradeable contracts)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBaseRiskScore(string,string,uint256).details: Set base risk score for region and crop

setCancellationFeePercentage(uint256).details: Set cancellation fee percentage (in basis points)

setMinimumPremiumPercentage(uint256).details: Set minimum premium percentage (in basis points)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
